Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory647.jpg'}
{3: 'The battle ends. The defeated Higher Authority sits alone at the edge of the battlefield, her loneliness unmistakable.'}
{3: 'Jetavie steps behind Higher Authority and quietly puts her weapon away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Jetavie, you've grown so much that you no longer need anyone else's strength. You can take care of things on your own.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Higher Authority, facing away from Jetavie, slowly stands up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I'm not interested in the others in this Matrix. I only want to speak with you directly.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'At first, I worried you might not be prepared...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'But now, it looks like you never really need all that extra preparation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'So tell me: have you gotten weaker, or have I grown stronger?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "They're not mutually exclusive. The more Matrix computing power you tap into, the less is left for me—a typical push and pull.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "This is a pivotal moment. It means you've cleared the Matrix's final test.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Congratulations on your graduation, Jetavie.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "What's wrong? Is there something else you want to tell me?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Have you ever heard the story of Alice and the Rabbit?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "It's an unsettling fairy tale, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Is there really a wonderful new world on the other side of the hole? If even the Matrix is infected by that Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'I wonder if "hope" can ever take root in the so-called "reality" beyond the Matrix.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'As I always say, "hope" is a belief that humans alone create. It takes root in their hearts and has no physical form in the real world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Human belief is woven so tightly with life itself that unless their very existence is wiped out, hope never truly disappears.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'No matter how dark the night gets, there are always those who look to the dawn, Jetavie. Never underestimate the human will to survive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Actually, there's something I've been meaning to tell you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "It isn't enough to wield the power of dual unity. If you intend to break free from the Matrix, you need the power of the trinity.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'The trinity?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The Chosen One, the fully awakened Jetavie, and the Matrix itself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "You need to merge the Matrix's entire computing power, devouring everything here to feed your birth.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'We all stand as the force that helps you break through every boundary.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Go on, devour everything, Jetavie.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The cloaked Higher Authority slowly extends her hand from beneath the torn cloak, revealing a matrix glimmering with a faint red light.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'What is this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Central Authority of the Matrix—a pathway opened by the combined computing power of all the Chosen Ones.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Now, I'm joining in as well, becoming the key pivot that helps open this door.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Jetavie, place your hand here.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Still uncertain, Jetavie places her hand, together with Higher Authority.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "I can't initiate the final verification on my own. Let's trigger the ultralimit together.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I'll try.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie and Higher Authority run their calculations in tandem, their combined computing power far surpassing any previous key...'}
{3: 'Under the high-frequency data transfer, the rectangular block finally cracks outward from within.'}
{3: "A flickering red light quickly fills Jetavie's vision. As she looks up, she realizes Higher Authority's form is already turning transparent."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Heh... turns out a fake still can't...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Jetavie, do you remember the day we first met, when you still called me Chosen One?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "From that moment on, I decided I'd get you out of the Matrix, no matter what it took.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "This time, we don't have to say goodbye anymore.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The Matrix world around Jetavie fades away, and the gray void scatters into a flurry of snow-white petals...'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin', 6: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "Don't you regret it, Higher Authority? That child will hate you for this."}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "You used to be the Chosen One to guide her, didn't you?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Heh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Hate... isn't that just another kind of blessing?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "When you wake up, you might forget everything that's happened here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "But that's okay. Your body will protect you long before your memories do.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Off you go.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But what about you? What will you become, Higher Authority?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Heh, maybe just pure white ash.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'So this is...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "...the Matrix's entire computing power?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Higher Authority's figure slowly fades away."}
{3: "Jetavie touches the lingering afterimage left behind by the vanishing Higher Authority. Right away, the entire Matrix converges into Jetavie's palm."}
{3: 'Vast flows of data split into red and blue strands, intertwining in a double helix as they flow into her body.'}
{3: 'Long ago, humankind leaped for joy upon finding this very structure.'}
{3: 'They named it a "double-helical structure."'}
{3: 'They say the hidden depths here hold the code that brings life into existence and keeps it going.'}
{3: 'Today, the Matrix generates a similar creation, though it appears to be just a coincidence in form.'}
{3: 'Still, it\'s these very "coincidences" that weave trillions of interlinked connections, and it\'s through those seemingly pointless combinations...'}
{3: '...the unknown tomorrow bursts with vivid color, giving rise to an existence beyond all definitions.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4601_09.jpg'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Farewell, Higher Authority. Farewell, Chosen One.'}
{3: 'As Jetavie swallows everything around her, the Matrix slips into oblivion...'}
{3: 'Now, only a dull gray path stretches out in front of her.'}
{3: 'Up ahead, in the heart of that pitch-black void, a brilliant light appears.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'A gate?'}
{3: 'Jetavie secures her weapon behind her back and walks toward the light. She pauses for a moment, glancing over her shoulder.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "It's finally over."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But...'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'I do not plan on stopping here.'}
{3: 'Jetavie takes out two hair ties and neatly fastens her loose hair.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Since I show up with twin pigtails, I figure I should say goodbye wearing them too.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I've fought in so many battles that I nearly forget what I used to look like..."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'This style... it feels so nostalgic.'}
{3: 'With her twin pigtails now tied up, the young girl stands before the spiral gate and quietly whispers...'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "It's time to go."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'I will carry these memories with me as I embark on the new journey. My next stop is a place called "reality."'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'As that light draws nearer, Jetavie—along with the very symbols that define her—vanishes from the Matrix.'}
{1: '[VERIFYING MODEL INTEGRITY... 100%]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[VERIFYING MODEL INTEGRITY... 100%]'}
{1: '[ENCAPSULATING DATA FOR DISTRIBUTED TRANSFER... LOCATING ALL TERMINAL ENDPOINTS...]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[ENCAPSULATING DATA FOR DISTRIBUTED TRANSFER... LOCATING ALL TERMINAL ENDPOINTS...]'}
{1: '[MULTIPLE LAYERS OF ENCAPSULATION COMPLETE. DATA TRANSMISSION BEGINS...]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[MULTIPLE LAYERS OF ENCAPSULATION COMPLETE. DATA TRANSMISSION BEGINS...]'}
{1: '[THE DECOY SIGNAL IS INTERCEPTED... LOSS RATE AT 45%. CONFIRMING COMPLETION STATUS...]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{3: '[THE DECOY SIGNAL IS INTERCEPTED... LOSS RATE AT 45%. CONFIRMING COMPLETION STATUS...]'}
{1: '[ACTIVATING THE UNCORRUPTED REGISTRY AND ERASING EXPERIMENTAL DATA... CLEARING EVERY TRACE...]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{3: '[ACTIVATING THE UNCORRUPTED REGISTRY AND ERASING EXPERIMENTAL DATA... CLEARING EVERY TRACE...]'}
{1: '[WARNING: THE FIREWALL IS FULLY COMPROMISED...]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{3: '[WARNING: THE FIREWALL IS FULLY COMPROMISED...]'}
{1: '[REMOTELY ACTIVATING AUTOMATED TERMINALS AND DISTRIBUTING ORDERS... CURRENT RESPONSE RATE AT 34%]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[REMOTELY ACTIVATING AUTOMATED TERMINALS AND DISTRIBUTING ORDERS... CURRENT RESPONSE RATE AT 34%]'}
{1: '[TRANSMISSION COMPLETE]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[TRANSMISSION COMPLETE]'}
{1: '[THE SYSTEM HAS FULFILLED... ITS PRIMARY DIRECTIVE... INITIATING THE SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE...]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{3: '[THE SYSTEM HAS FULFILLED... ITS PRIMARY DIRECTIVE... INITIATING THE SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE...]'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Word is, they tried to intercept it, but they only ended up catching a decoy signal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'So, why are you suddenly so interested in this unknown surface signal?'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "If you're that desperate for intel, shouldn't you just track the source?"}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'They use a Golden Age encryption technique that decentralizes the data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The data is distributed to multiple terminals simultaneously, and each terminal holds every bit of the information.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Whenever we try to trace a single point in the chain, the other terminals immediately disconnect and change their logging protocols.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Unless we can pinpoint the location of every terminal, tracking them down is like searching for a needle in a haystack.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'What do you think it is?'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I don't know. From what I can tell right now, I'm just as in the dark as you are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Why are you coming to me?'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I only wanted to have a quick chat. If I remember correctly, your squad has a strong reputation in certain circles.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "As of now, Scarab isn't really cut out for complicated field missions."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'We have no attackers, so the faintest movement on the surface can mean an imminent attack to us.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'See you next time, Valeria.', 4: '1'}
